headline: A Quest That Has Translated Into New Investments
summary: My research colleague, John Bleday, and I have spent a lot of our time looking for great companies. How has the translated into new investments? Find out.

headline: Giverny Capital Asset Management Q4 2024 Letter

headline: Fast-paced Momentum Stock CarMax (KMX) Is Still Trading at a Bargain
summary: CarMax (KMX) made it through our 'Fast-Paced Momentum at a Bargain' screen and could be a great choice for investors looking for stocks that have gained strong momentum recently but are still trading at reasonable prices.
